author: cbs8
title: OH SNAP! Facilitates the Taking of Selfies and Group Photos - Designed by InventHelp Client (VET-302)
text:
InventHelp is submitting this idea, OH SNAP!, to companies in the hopes of their good faith review.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 11, 2015
While reviewing a family photo taken during the holidays, an inventor from North Las Vegas, Nev., noticed that his father-in-law was missing due to having had to work the camera. "One family member was always missing from different shots due to this problem," he said. "This inspired me to design a better way to take such photos."
Versatile, easy to use and producible in a children's version, OH SNAP! provides a better way to take selfies and group photos. It eliminates the need to hold the camera at armâ€™s length, as well as avoids having to leave someone out of a shot. It also allows for more convenient and versatile storage, display and sharing of photos. It sown social network will be included eventually.
The original design was submitted to the Las Vegas office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-VET-302, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
